listitem.simpara: Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).

listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.4-8 are included:

The following updated packages from Debian Stretch 10.12 are included (53918):
advancecomp agg aide ansible apache2 apache-log4j1.2 apache-log4j2 apng2gif aria2 axis botan1.10 btrbk cacti cargo-mozilla cgal ckeditor commons-io composer condor connman debian-archive-keyring debian-edu-config drupal7 edk2 eterm fig2dev firebird3.0 freecad gdal gerbv gif2apng glusterfs golang-1.7 golang-1.8 graphicsmagick gst-libav1.0 gst-plugins-bad1.0 gst-plugins-ugly1.0 gthumb h2database hivex htmldoc icinga2 ieee-data ipmitool ipython ircii jackson-databind jetty9 ldns libdatetime-timezone-perl libextractor libgetdata libimage-exiftool-perl libjdom1-java libjdom2-java libmodbus libntlm libpam-tacplus libpano13 libphp-adodb librecad libspf2 libspring-java libxml-security-java libxstream-java libxstream-java lighttpd linux-4.19 linux-latest-4.19 linux-latest linuxptp llvm-toolchain-11 lrzip lrzsz lynx mailman mbedtls mediawiki minidlna monit mosquitto mrxvt mupdf netkit-rsh neutron nginx node-bl nvidia-graphics-drivers opendmarc opensc paramiko pgbouncer plib postgis privoxy prosody python-scrapy python-treq pywps pyxdg rails rdflib redis redmine resiprocate ring roundcube ruby-actionpack-page-caching ruby-haml ruby-kaminari ruby-nokogiri ruby-sidekiq rust-cbindgen rustc-mozilla rxvt rxvt-unicode salt scilab scrollz shiro slurm-llnl sogo sphinxsearch spip squashfs-tools sssd strongswan thunderbird tnef tomcat8 tryton-proteus tryton-server tzdata ujson unbound1.9 usermode uwsgi weechat wordpress xmlbeans zabbix zsh

The following updated packages from Debian Buster 11.3 are included (54530):
gcc-8 linux linux-signed-amd64 linux-signed-i386

The following packages have been moved to the maintained repository of UCS:
backports.functools-lru-cache (52920) pigz (54485) python-pathlib (53237) python-tzlocal (53675) unidecode (52878)

listitem.simpara: The behavior of the translog overlay was modified to skip grandchildren of the cn=temporary,cn=univention container. This new behavior can be controlled by the &ucsUCRV; ldap/translog-ignore-temporary. This reduces the number of replication transactions during creation of users and groups significantly. As a result it increases the replication performance and reduces the rate at which the cn=translog LMDB backend database gets filled. This variable is applicable only to the &ucsPrimaryDN;. The package univention-ldap-server activates this variable by default (54446).
Log error if file listener/listener cannot be written (53821).
Consistently write <TransID> if last_id could not be determined as all (53821).
Check file listener/listener if getting last_id fails (53821).
Remove unused code leading to problems while updating to UCS 5 (52956).
Set listener module replication.py priority directly in the file (54504).
Log messages of univention-translog have been improved (53821).
The script univention-translog now also checks the file listener/listener.priv if that exists (53821).
The script univention-translog recognizes the special values <TransID> and 0 and is able to fix them (53821).
Restarting the systemd unit is now limited to 50 times in an observation window of 1000 seconds (53821).
The notifier aborts if the transaction ID issued by the OpenLDAP translog overlay is not a valid integer (53821).
Remove hard-coded replication.py listener module priority from univention-directory-listener. Instead, the priority is now set by package univention-directory-replication (54504).
Make module execution order configurable by explicitly specifying a priority (54061).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
Functionality of some widgets has been adjusted for specific use cases (53847).
The DateBox and TimeBox widgets now handle empty values correctly and support the date2 syntax again (53675).
The login page no longer has the Login entry in the menu (53617).
The cache settings of &ucsUMC; have been enhanced and relaxed to fix caching issues after the upgrade to UCS 5.0 (37720).
The UDM REST API now supports multiprocessing via the &ucsUCRV; directory/manager/rest/processes. Further details can be found in performance guide (53669).
The configuration of log rotation for the UDM REST API logfiles has been added (53986).
The login page no longer has the Login entry in the menu (53617).
Access to the &ucsUMC; has been repaired if the user is allowed to use only one module which does not have a flavor (53710).
SAML logouts which are initiated by another service provider are now correctly handled (53638).
The new &ucsUCRV; umc/http/enforce-secure-cookie can be set to make cookies secure when using a HTTPS connection (53511).
The new &ucsUCRV; umc/http/enforce-session-cookie can be set to make the login cookie a session cookie: Closing the browser will delete the cookie, effectively logging out the user (52353).
The cache settings of &ucsUMC; have been enhanced and relaxed to fix caching issues after the upgrade to UCS 5.0 (37720).
When being logged in via SAML a refresh of the SAML authentication at the UMC server (or LDAP server) is now done correctly again after the validity of the SAML message expired (54229).
Fixed a regression where the App installation failed if the App had certain App settings (53677).
App settings of the scope outside are now applied on the system before the App's preinst script (53609).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Expose the parameter sizelimit in the simple UDM API (53832).
Make LDAP object classes and attribute names selectable (31857).
Make options in Extended Attributes selectable (25054).
Add syntax class to select UDM syntax class for Extended Attributes (52683).
UDM now enforces uniqueness of the name of objects in the same subtree position (53725).
It is now possible to set an account activation date for users, e.g. via the property accountActivationDate in the UDM users/user module (53675).
The simple UDM API now exposes the option remove_childs from the UDM function remove() in the method delete() to recursively delete objects below the DN of the object that is being deleted (53620).

ucs_registerLDAPExtension from the UCS shell function library now allows the option umcmessagecatalog. This option can be used to supply translation files in GNU message catalog format for the UMC (53362).
Users/LDAP objects could not be created if the mspolicy password complexity criteria was configured due to the missing displayname (52446).
Turkish umlauts are now correctly converted to ASCII letters (52878).

When setting an user as a member of a group in UDM, that had the same UID but a different DN of another member, the related attribute memberUid of the group got dropped. This happened in the cool Solution user-group-sync during move operations (54487).
UDM can now handle environments where the module refint for uniqueMember has been enabled (48956).
Adding and removing users to/from large groups is now faster (51233).
The file permissions of files /etc/machine.secret.SAVE are now set before the files are written (49033).
Rebuilt to match the new LDB package version (54014).
The system diagnostic check no longer shows false positives when a HTTP proxy is used (53575).
The new check 61_notifier_protocol_version will now be skipped on systems without univention-directory-notifier and therefore no longer produces false positive results (54365).
A diagnostic module has been added to check the &ucsUCRV; notifier/protocol/version (50733).
While copying an user object entries were not filled correctly and therefore saving was not possible (53859).
Empty values are now prepended to static values for certain widgets if the syntax class requires this (53675).
Rewriting properties of apps using App Options changed the original options leading to follow up errors especially in the UDM REST API (53715).
The user creation wizard now shows the mailPrimaryAdress if it is required. The default value and visibility of widgets in the user creation wizard can now be configured via UCR (53514).
UDM now enforces uniqueness of the name of objects in the same subtree position (53725).

ucs_registerLDAPExtension from the UCS shell function library now allows the option umcmessagecatalog. This option can be used to supply translation files in GNU message catalog format for the UMC (53362).
The cache settings of &ucsUMC; have been enhanced and relaxed to fix caching issues after the upgrade to UCS 5.0 (37720).
The package univention-ldb-modules has been rebuilt to match the new version of package ldb (54014).
A new shell library function echowithtimestamp was added (54019).
Prevent non-blocking components to crash the UMC updater module during the update to UCS 5.0-0 (53228).

Permissions to use a SAML service provider in UCS can be configured on a user object or at group objects for all members of the group. The check via the memberOf attribute for group membership was not done case insensitive (53432).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
The &ucsUDL; module listfilter.py did not respect the &ucsUCRV; mail/postfix/policy/listfilter/use_sasl_username=yes when it is executed with the option --test (46176).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
The Nagios plugin check_univention_slapd_mdb_maxsize now takes the number of free pages into account for checking the size of the LDAP database (49291).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
Timeout SSL certificate download after 10 minutes (53810).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
The UCR module for samba share restrictions did not quote the spaces inside share names like the samba listener does (53799).
Added username map script for use when samba is configured as domain member (54014).
access to home shares via NTLM authentication on member servers has been fixed (54320).
During a server password change the Samba process was not restarted in some cases. The script to restart Samba was fixed to ensure the service is restarted successfully (51535).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
Access to home shares via NTLM authentication on member servers has been fixed (54320).
Add username map script for use when samba is configured as domain member (54014).
LDB source code has been adjusted to support new samba security patches (54014).
The user expiry was off by one day between UCS and Samba. This discrepancy has been removed (54433).
Server password change now logs timestamps (54019).
Invalid values in the LDAP attribute sambaNTPassword are now ignored instead of triggering a traceback (49590).
The Nagios check for univention-ad-connector reported a false positive if multiple &ucsADC; instances were running (51869).
The value for resynchronization of rejected changes from AD was fixed to use the documented default of 10 retries instead of 0, if the &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/max_retry_rejected is not set (54432).
UCS rejects are resynchronized only a certain amount of times. This is configurable via a new &ucsUCRV; connector/ad/max_retry_rejected, which defaults to 10 tries (49867).
Fix verification error with alternate chains. Addresses issue with Let's Encrypt certificates starting 2021-10-01 (53863).

A SAML service provider configuration can now contain an array of attributes in the option case_insensitive_attributes when using an authorize:Authorize filter. These attributes will be compared case insensitive (53432).

ucs_registerLDAPExtension from the UCS shell function library now allows the option umcmessagecatalog. This option can be used to supply translation files in GNU message catalog format for the UMC (53362).
The package python3-stdlib-extensions has been moved to maintained (54406).

A new &ucsUCRV; ldap/translog-ignore-temporary has been created to control if UDM temporary objects should be considered for replication by the OpenLDAP translog overlay which feeds the Listener/Notifier. This reduces the number of replication transactions during creation of users and groups significantly. As a result it increases the replication performance and reduces the rate at which the LMDB backend database cn=translog gets filled. This variable is applicable only to the &ucsPrimaryDN;. By default is will be set to yes during package installation and update (54446).
The file /etc/machine.secret.SAVE is no longer readable by everyone (49033).

On the &ucsPrimaryDN; the LDAP server module refint can now be enabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; ldap/refint=true. It enforces referential integrity for the attribute uniqueMember. For updates the module will not be enabled by default (48956).

The group membership cache now returns an empty list instead of None when requesting non-existing keys. This fixes a traceback in the Microsoft 365 Connector listener, when not every ADConnectionAlias has at least one user (54561).
Fix the upgrade path for the group membership cache to work all time from the initial update to UCS 5.0-0 up to installing the latest erratum (54206).
The cache now supports caches with a reverse mapping (54119).
The package was added to provide a very fast user and group membership cache (54068).
